caption:
This photograph features a serene landscape dominated by a large snow-capped mountain in the background, which commands attention as the focal point. The mountain is striking against a clear blue sky. In front of the mountain and across the body of water, there appear to be industrial structures, including stacks emitting white smoke or steam, suggesting an active industrial site.

In the foreground, we see a calm waterway that reflects the sky above. A strip of land or a breakwater is visible, partially covered with large mounds of what could be coal or another raw material. This divides the water from the industrial background. 

On the right side of the image, masts of docked or moored ships protrude into the sky, adding a maritime element to the industrial feel of the scene.

The composition effectively contrasts natural beauty and industrial activity, creating a layered perspective from nature's tranquility in the foreground, through human industrial endeavors, to the majestic mountain in the distance. The use of natural light enriches the color palette, from the deep blues of the water to the muted grays and blacks of industry, and the pristine white of the snow, enhancing the overall atmospheric quality of the image.
title: GRandeur of show-clad mt.  Rainier contrasts with dirty slag pile of the tacoma smelter on commencement bay.  The smelter, a major copper refining operation, contributes significantly to the air pollution level of this highly industrialized area
